stimulusHtml: Find all values of t in the interval 2 ≤ t ≤ 4 for which the speed of the particle is 2.

features.html: A particle moves along a straight line. For 0 ≤ t ≤5 , the velocity of the particle is given by v(t)=-2+(t2+3t)6/5-t3, and the position of the particle is given by s(t). It is known that s(0)=10.
